name: The Hungry Baby Black Hole
description:
Rushing making a game is always a bad idea, and my little prototype is a perfect example. I completely changed my idea when were remaning 6h, and I've tried to do my best. I couldn't implement the main mechanic and the "Cozy" topic is too vague. Nonetheless, I decided to publish it because is almost a year that I develop things and they only moves in the deeply small component of my computer. So: unfinished, uncomplete, broken, vague, wip; is, anyway, something.

At the end of the Jam I'll add all the most relevant feature and other ideas I had in mind.

Thank for stopping by.
